member.name: T:Waher.Networking.Cluster.ClusterEndpoint
member.summary: Represents one endpoint (or participant) in the network cluster.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.Cluster.ClusterEndpoint.#ctor(System.Net.IPAddress,System.Int32,System.String,Waher.Networking.Sniffers.ISniffer[])
member.summary: Represents one endpoint (or participant) in the network cluster.
member.param: UDP Multicast address used for cluster communication.
Shared secret. Used to encrypt and decrypt communication. Secret is UTF-8 encoded and then hashed before being fed to AES.
Optional set of sniffers to use.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.Cluster.ClusterEndpoint.#ctor(System.Net.IPAddress,System.Int32,System.Byte[],Waher.Networking.Sniffers.ISniffer[])
member.summary: Represents one endpoint (or participant) in the network cluster.
member.param: UDP Multicast address used for cluster communication.
Shared secret. Used to encrypt and decrypt communication. Secret is hashed before being fed to AES.
If communication over the loopback interface should be permitted. (Default=false)
Optional set of sniffers to use.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.Cluster.ClusterEndpoint.Deserialize(System.Byte[])
member.exception: If the corresponding type, or any of the embedded properties, could not be found.

member.name: E:Waher.Networking.Cluster.ClusterEndpoint.OnMessageReceived
member.summary: Event raised when a cluster message has been received.

member.summary: Sends a message using acknowledged service.
member.param: Message to send using acknowledged service.
Method to call when responses have been returned.
State object to pass on to callback method.

member.summary: Sends a message using acknowledged service.

member.name: T:Waher.Networking.Cluster.EndpointAcknowledgement
member.summary: Contains information about one of the endpoints in the cluster.

member.name: P:Waher.Networking.Cluster.EndpointAcknowledgement.ACK
member.summary:
Acknowledgement response:
true = Message actively acknowledged (ACK) false = Message actively rejected, or not acknowledged (NACK) null = Message not acknowledged or rejected.

member.name: T:Waher.Networking.Cluster.EndpointStatus
member.summary: Contains information about one of the endpoints in the cluster.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.Cluster.IClusterMessage.MessageReceived(Waher.Networking.Cluster.ClusterEndpoint,System.Net.IPEndPoint)
member.summary: Method called when the message has been received.
member.param: Cluster endpoint that received the message.
member.returns: If the message was accepted/processed or not. In Acknowledged service, this corresponds to ACK/NACK.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.Cluster.MessageStatus.IsComplete(Waher.Networking.Cluster.EndpointStatus[])
member.summary: If all responses have been returned.
member.returns: If all responses have been returned.

member.name: T:Waher.Networking.Cluster.Messages.Alive
member.summary: Alive message regularly sent on the network to inform members of the cluster of the status of the current machine.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.Cluster.Messages.Alive.MessageReceived(Waher.Networking.Cluster.ClusterEndpoint,System.Net.IPEndPoint)
member.summary: Method called when the message has been received.
member.param: Cluster endpoint that received the message.
member.returns: If the message was accepted/processed or not. In Acknowledged service, this corresponds to ACK/NACK.

member.name: T:Waher.Networking.Cluster.Messages.ShuttingDown
member.summary: Message sent when an endpoint is shut down, to let the other endpoints know the current endpoint is no longer available.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.Cluster.Messages.ShuttingDown.MessageReceived(Waher.Networking.Cluster.ClusterEndpoint,System.Net.IPEndPoint)
member.summary: Message sent when an endpoint is shut down, to let the other endpoints know the current endpoint is no longer available.
member.param: Cluster endpoint that received the message.
member.returns: If the message was accepted/processed or not. In Acknowledged service, this corresponds to ACK/NACK.
